features: [Designed For Sleep] The two-layer flange ergonomic earbud tips are made of soft silicone, they have a low profile and are designed to fit snugly in ear even for side sleeping. The tight fit of the earbud seals your ear canal from external physical sounds, resulting in passive noise reduction.

[Lightweight] The earbuds are attached to wires that run along the length of the neckband so that you can easily control the music or calls at your fingertips. Super lightweight, only weighs 22.3g(0.78oz), which are incredibly light and non-obstructive, ideal for sleep, relaxing, meditating, travel, yoga, leisure time and everyday use.

[Built to Last] The earbuds are built in bulletproof tough wire which is really sturdy and durable, you don’t need to worry that the earbuds will be broken although you toss and turn on the bed all over the night.

[Up to 25+Hours Long Playtime] With a powerful rechargeable batteries (250mAh), it provides up to 25+ hours of continuous music or phone conversation on a single full charge, which can last a whole day or several nights, resolves the hassle of continuous charging. In terms of sound quality, it offers a full-range sound and effectively block out noise, making them ideal for drowning out snoring with your music, audiobooks or podcasts.

[Advanced Bluetooth V5.2 Connectivity] The earbud features the latest Bluetooth 5.2 version with new and improved signal quality that provides a secure Bluetooth connection that it stutter-free and reliable with a good range. With a 3-button in-line remote along the wire, it lets you answer phone calls, control music, adjust volume and more very easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite without a doubt, and STELLAR customer service.
reviews.reviewText: I received no special consideration in exchange for this review, unless you want to call the stellar customer service a special benefit.Without question, this is the MOST comfortable and functional set of headphone/earbuds I've purchased.1. The extended battery life is due to battery storage in the neckband, which is attached to the earbuds with a generous length of cable. I haven't EVER run the battery out.2. Said cables are PLENTY long, so that there isn't a constant stress of tension, pulling on the earbuds.3. The neckband is lightweight and flexible; you may have to touch it to reassure yourself it's there. It cannot possibly pinch your neck or head, unless you are an elephant; GREAT for humans.4. I'd guess the entire apparatus was designed with comfort in mind. The earbuds are quite soft, and thus comfortable; I had no issue with inserting them.5. As the picture shows, the control pack is a part of the neckband designated 'R'. Since one of my adult children is a lefty, I tried reversing by putting on the unit upside down, and had ZERO problems.6. Where I did have problems: a. The charging plug on my first purchase became defective during the 30 day Amazon terms, and a second unit was shipped immediately at no cost. b. The sound on the second unit became distorted AFTER the 30 day Amazon trial. However, when I contacted the company, they drop-shipped a third unit with no hassle, and again, no cost.7. I was shocked by the speed and courtesy that they responded to my out-of-date inquiry. I had expected that I was just going to have to absorb the cost of the second unit, but that was not the case at all.8. The packaging is excellent, without excess material beyond that necessary for safe shipping. In addition to the unit itself, a nice, LARGE and durable-appearing velvet drawstring bag is included.9. I suffer from insomnia, and have found that listening to semi-boring podcasts helps me get to sleep. Previously purchased headsets have interfered with my sleep, due to hard material, or slippage. These function almost invisibly, and I can have Johnny Dollar or Sam Spade lull me to sleep each night.10. During the day, I can listen to music, audible books, or podcasts while doing other things.I would HAPPILY recommend this to friends and family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for the price, and great customer service!
reviews.reviewText: These are honestly excellent for the price. The sound quality is quite good (to a layman, anyway), and the battery life is fantastic. They're also very comfortable for sleeping, even on your side, because the whole earpiece is made of soft silicone. Unfortunately the "battery low" warning is quite loud and startling, but I typically charge them once they reach about 40% to avoid that. Even using them all night every night, I only have to charge them every 3-4 nights. I use them to listen to ASMR, white noise, etc. and to block out my partner's snoring (which they do well, despite not being actively noise cancelling), and I am extremely happy with them.The only real problem I have with these earbuds is that they do not seem to last very long. Since they are intended for sleeping, I had concerns about the wires kinking during the night and getting damaged, especially around the connections to the neck band. I had been using the wired version of the Hearprotek sleeping earbuds for several years, and I loved them, but they only lasted about 8 months before one of the buds would die. Not a big deal since those only cost something like $15 for two pairs, but these are obviously a bit more costly and have more failure points in the design. I hoped that, since they were specifically advertised as "extra tough," they would survive for at least as long as the wired version. Unfortunately, after about 4 months of nightly use, the right earbud died. I messaged the seller, and not only did they send me a free replacement, they actually seemed interested in fixing the issue I had! They asked me in detail about the problem, as if they intend to actually use that information to improve the design, which made me feel much better about buying new products from them in the future.Overall I'm very pleased with my experience with this brand, and I highly recommend checking these out if you're looking for affordable, comfortable wireless earbuds.

reviews.reviewTitle: These are the best headphones for sleeping, period.
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable, great noise cancellation, battery life is phenomenal. I’ve tried others and these are by far the best. One more item. I purchase these a year ago and I accidentally pulled a wire out. Purchased them again and they’ve UPGRADED the ear buds. Better sound, more sturdy wires and more sturdy volume and on off switch. Now how many earbud manufacturers can you say do that?Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewTitle: The only headset I can wear while sleeping, and it does a great job
reviews.reviewText: The earbuds are truly tiny, there's absolutely no issue wearing these while sleeping on my side for an entire night, so these earbuds hit that target 100%.Compared to high-end earbuds, these earbud's sound quality is medium, but as good or better than many 20$-30$ wired earbuds I've tried.Battery life is out of this world. I recharge them every morning and I've never gotten a single low-battery warning, so these easily last an entire night's sleep plus more.I did have some issues with the USB port. This is my second purchase of this headset, my first one broke on me about 1 1/2 months after purchase, the internal USB connector splintered internally so I couldn't plug and recharge it anymore. The seller didn't want to honour the warranty because he/she felt it was due to abuse (it wasn't), but in the same response the seller also offered a very strong rebate so I could buy another pair pretty cheaply, which I did. This new pair is lasting well, so I'm writing off the first failure to manufacturing defect. I would have much preferred the seller to honour the warranty, but for the price, it wasn't a bad proposition, and I'm happy to have a great headset I can wear while sleeping, whatever my position.

I have had these for a month. I use them quietly for sleep meditations and stories. Not a lot of bass but you could get by listening to music with them. The neck band is very comfortable and you forget they are there. I toss and turn a lot sometimes and never get caught up. Have only used for a month so can't speak to their longevity but so far so good.

Although initially satisfied due to long battery life and mediocre sound (not a concern since I’m just listening to audiobooks), the life span of these earphones is not long.Each time they work fine on arrival. Use for about 3 months and then the right side stops working altogether. So now I can only hear music and audiobooks on one side if it is perfectly positioned (not easy during sleep). I tried emailing the manufacturer for support but have receive no response.First time this happened, I thought it was just bad luck with a bad pair but when this happened for a second time, I can confirm it’s a quality issue. If you read the other reviews, this is a common problem. I do not recommend.

So weird review here. iIreally like these headphones. They are comfortable to sleep in and the battery life is amazing. I charge every fourth day and that's using them up to 8 hours a day.So here is the bad part. I am on my 3rd pair since Oct Of 2022.first pair died in Feb of 23. Only one side worked. 2nd pair stopped charging July of 2023 .Third pair arrived Aug of 2023 and one side has very low volumne.
